title: New: Cosmo Jarvis – My Day
content:
With Is The World Strange Or Am I Strange? due to drop on the 26th of September, Cosmo Jarvis has released the video for ‘My Day’, a frenetic call to arms and nostalgia, which retains the urgency of his earlier works whilst charting his aural progression to an established electric artist, away from his previous acoustic roots.

If anything, it marks the continuation of Cosmo’s refusal to be inihibited by labels and genre, whilst the ludicrous video perfectly fits the idealism and energy of the track.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d4c
